definitions.text: a member of the genus Canis (probably descended from the common wolf) that has been domesticated by man since prehistoric times; occurs in many breeds
a dull unattractive unpleasant girl or woman
examples: she got a reputation as a frump

definitions.text: a smooth-textured sausage of minced beef or pork usually smoked; often served on a bread roll
a hinged catch that fits into a notch of a ratchet to move a wheel forward or prevent it from moving backward
metal supports for logs in a fireplace
examples: the andirons were too hot to touch

definitions.text: go after with the intent to catch
examples: The policeman chased the mugger down the alley
